title: How many feet of wood is required for a door? Is it 8*3 or 7*3 feet? - Quora

response.answer_text: The most common door sizes are 3 feet wide and 6 foot 8 inches tall or 3 feet wide and 7 feet tall or 3 feet wide and 8 feet tall. Take your pick c 7 feet is common for commercial / office type settings. 6’8” is common in residential uses. 8 ‘ is more high end commercial
